entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Winchester
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:33 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.6°C

entry.title: Friday: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers becoming mixed with flurries this morning and ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning early this evening and ending after midnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
